unnormalised: Hey everyone! Thinking of buying a flat in Mumbai and super stressed about choosing the right builder. Been scouring the internet for builder reviews, and itâ€™s a jungle out there!
normalised: Hey everyone! Thinking of buying a flat in Mumbai and super stressed about choosing the right builder. Been scouring the internet for builder reviews, and it's a jungle out there!

unnormalised: Seriously, how reliable are these online reviews anyway? It's like judging a whole season of Bigg Boss based on a 5-minute clip. Some reviews seem genuine, praising the builder's attention to detail, like Mr. Sharma in Andheri who said his builder delivered on time and the quality was top-notch. But then you see others complaining about delays, hidden costs, and poor construction quality. Someone even mentioned their building's plumbing resembling the Ganges during the monsoon season!
normalised: Seriously, how reliable are these online reviews anyway? It's like judging a whole season of Bigg Boss based on a five minute clip. Some reviews seem genuine, praising the builder's attention to detail, like Mister Sharma in Andheri who said his builder delivered on time and the quality was top-notch. But then you see others complaining about delays, hidden costs, and poor construction quality. Someone even mentioned their building's plumbing resembling the Ganges during the monsoon season!

unnormalised: I'm particularly interested in feedback on builders near IIT Bombay in Powai. Any experiences with Rohan Builders or Godrej Properties around that area? I'm planning to invest roughly Rs. 1.5 Cr and really don't want to end up with a "Housefull" situation, where I'm stuck with a problematic property.
normalised: I'm particularly interested in feedback on builders near I I T Bombay in Powai. Any experiences with Rohan Builders or Godrej Properties around that area? I'm planning to invest roughly rupee one point five crore and really don't want to end up with a "Housefull" situation, where I'm stuck with a problematic property.

unnormalised: Are there any specific websites or forums that are more trustworthy for Indian builder reviews? Or should I just rely on word-of-mouth from friends and family? Any tips or insights would be greatly appreciated! I need all the help I can get before committing to this huge investment. Dhanyavad!
